Pre-Game Insights: Sacramento Kings will attempt to continue its three-game win streak with a victory against Golden State.
The Warriors are 1-5 in division play.
The Kings are 2-6 against the rest of their division.
The Warriors are shooting 45.0% from the field this season, 1.6 percentage points lower than the 46.6% the Kings allow to opponents.
The Kings are shooting 47.6% from the field, 2.4% higher than the 45.2% the Warriors' opponents have shot this season.
Stephen Curry is averaging 22.3 points and 6.5 assists for the Warriors.
Domantas Sabonis is averaging 20.5 points, 13.7 rebounds and 6.1 assists for the Kings.
